activities: Aderant is a developer of financial and practice management software. It licenses the software and provides the related support and consulting services to international law firms, accounting and other consultancies. In this context it may receive personal information in databases sent to the U.S. for software application testing and correction purposes.  It also may receive human resources data from its London office which will be used internally for reporting and analysis purposes.   None of the personal information used by Aderant for these purposes is disclosed to third parties who are outside of the Aderant companies.
eucountries: Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line, human resources data, client data
recoursemech:
EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) for HR Data Only
American Arbitration Association (AAA)
JAMS
CEDRA
